Projet d'heveaculture de la SAPH -
            Cote d'Ivoire

abstracts.cdata!:
The Project would be implemented over
            seven years and would aim at developing 3,000 ha of
            smallholding rubber around Anguededou, Bongo and Toupah;
            2,000 ha of a nucleus industrial estate at Songan and 500 ha
            of smallholding in association with this estate. The project
            would include the maintenance of these areas during the
            project period until they enter into production, and the
            setting up of training and extension services for the
            participating farmers.
